ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, I had gone back to look at the stats last night so I have them with me.  You re in luck.  But first, we mostly did Mountain Giants last night.  We saw a
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, I had gone back to look at the stats last night so I have them with me. You're in luck. But
first, we mostly did Mountain Giants last night. We saw a number of new items including a ring AC10 +10
Strength, a tunic called tree weave AC25 +10 strength wearable by just about EVERY class and race except
pure nukers (mages/necros/wiz). My wife's warrior got the ring which goes great with her Efreeti ring on
her other hand. Another warrior got the tunic. The tunic looks like leather so it is hilareous to see
this warrior running around in all crafted and a leather BP.

The necro stuff is a Flayed Skin Tunic, AC 16 -2 charisma, +5 to all protect, +20 hp nec and shadow only
and the bracer was AC6 -2 char, +5 int, +5 all prot shadow and necro only I believe. The key though is
they could not be worn by gnomes or inkies. I believe they are both human/euradite only. Both items
were looted almost back to back in Karnor.

"Cyr, Thierry" wrote:

> What are the necro items you got? where and off what? i play a necro and am
> looking for goodies all the time... What were the stats other then AC? and
> could inkies wear em?
>
> Rakka -50 necro
> Minkin -36 bard
> Sol Ro
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jeff Illian [SMTP:jeff@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 2:39 PM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kunark: first impressions
> >
> > We saw a number of new items drop last night also including an AC16 -2Cha
> > +5 just about everything else
> > shadow knight/necro tunic and a AC6 Necro bracer (both purple). We also
> > saw Mace of Ykesha drop about 4
> > times, dam 10, del 22, effect Ykesha. A friend paladin got an Awesome Axe
> > dam 32, del 40, +6 str +6 agi
> > and my wife looted a rather humerous Axe, Dam 45, del 150 Barb/Troll/Ogre
> > only off of a Mountain Giant.
> > The one that I'm REALLY trying to get right now is a good friend (another
> > bard) got a pair of AC18 bard
> > only boots plus some stats that are the same color as the hero bracer out
> > of Kunar Castle :-)
> >
> > Sylly Songsynger wrote:
> >
> > > I could tell ya but then I would have to kill ya and Miriana too! (just
> > > kiddin!) (inside joke: her guild and mine are fiendly rivals on the same
> > > server.)
> > >
> > > We got 3 nice swords last night that I dont think anybody else (on our
> > > server) has. One is a big daddy Yk <eg>. Throneblade of Ykesha. 2HS 33
> > /
> > > 51, str + 6, int + 6 proc: Ykesha. Another is Jade Reaver 2HS 23/40, 12
> > wt,
> > > war/pal/shd/rng. And also a Jade Broadsword 1HS 11 / 25 str+8 sv
> > Poison+10
> > > Disease+10
> >
